org.jboss.windup.reporting.pegdown

Class WindupCodeBlockPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.parboiled.BaseActions<V>
      • org.parboiled.BaseParser<Object>
        • org.pegdown.Parser
          • org.jboss.windup.reporting.pegdown.WindupCodeBlockPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.parboiled.ContextAware<Object>, org.pegdown.Extensions, org.pegdown.plugins.BlockPluginParser, org.pegdown.plugins.ToHtmlSerializerPlugin

    public class WindupCodeBlockPlugin
extends org.pegdown.Parser
implements org.pegdown.plugins.BlockPluginParser, org.pegdown.plugins.ToHtmlSerializerPlugin
    Extends Pegdown with support for adding the language type after the code block indicator.
    This will cause text such as the following: 
         ```java
     System.out.println()
     ```

    To be rendered as java source code (by appending data-code-syntax='java' to the code element in the resulting output).

    Thanks to bradsdavis for the original code for this (adapted here for Windup).

    Author:
    jsightler
